Class DRAOptimizations.Coloring

  • java.lang.Object
    • jltl2dstar.DRAOptimizations.Coloring
  • Enclosing class:
    DRAOptimizations

    public static class DRAOptimizations.Coloring
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class, storing a coloring of the states
